Sean and Todd will take you to all the spots and make you feel really comfortable surfing at a new spot!! Everyone is super nice and willing to make your stay the best. Surf package is the way to go!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, Haley! You and Willow were awesome and we are looking forward to surfing with guys you again soon!    -Sean

Summary: Stayed for business and coming back with my wife and kids.  Rooms were big and comfy, everything anyone could need.  Great location and wonderful staff!!!  No question I'd stay here again, and again, and again...
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for the awesome review, Kyle! It was a pleasure having you our guest and I hope to see you and your family very soon!   -Sean

Summary: Cool room, awesome service. Felt super comfortable there. Surfboards for rent were actually good ones! Will definitely come again. Restaurant above makes the best poke bowls. Only downside was no where to hang anything. Nomads should put a bunch of hooks on the walls!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Cressida! ! We are looking forward to seeing you and your family again soon!   PS- Hooks are going up in the Ohana Room this week! Thank you for the feedback!   -Sean

Summary: My wife and I had an extended business trip scheduled in LA. After Business we had planned to stay near the beach and catch some surf. We booked the weekend in a large upscale hotel chain. When looking through Trip Advisor I came across Nomads and it looked like fun. I cancelled my reservation and booked Nomads. 10 days before our arrival My wife's Mother Passes. There is no way we may go, business appoints cancelled no problem, flights cancelled no problem, when we called Nomads we got sorry there nothing we can do about it. We tried to reason, and they wined about being small business, lesson learned "don't help small business" stay in the international chain hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Firefozz,  I‚Äôm very sorry for this misunderstanding. Our cancellation policy, that you agreed when you booked online, is the standard for all small "Boutique" hotels in Southern California. Unfortunately, for very small hotels like us, it is impossible to refund last minute cancellations because we have such limited room inventory. Here at Nomads we only have 4 regular hotel rooms, so your reservation made 1/4 of our inventory unavailable for weeks/months.   As a courtesy, we ALWAYS offer a credit for a later stay, and I‚Äôm sure we offered this to you. We usually give 6 months to 1 year to use a room credit, and have even extended that even further, when a guest asks for more time. Our offer still stands, if you would like to schedule your credit with us.   Hope to see you soon.   Sincerely,   Sean

Summary: The rooms were clean and comfortable. The surf lessons started on time and you don't have to worry about transportation, food... Everything is taken care of! Just enjoy surfing! They have an amazing restaurant upstairs where you can also meet the locals. Thanks Sean and keep up the good work!
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words, Anis! Come back and surf with us again soon! The waves have been amazing!!   -Sean

Summary: I stayed for a week at Nomads as I was passing through california and I can't recommend it enough. It was clean and tidy, functional rooms, and everyone working there was super friendly and approachable. I was mostly there to surf and Shaun was really keen to make sure I knew where and when would be best to get in, even offering rides down to the beach.  I don't think I could have been better looked after from that point of view. The only thing worth noting is that the walls are a little on the thinner side but provided in the rooms are a pot of ear plugs and with these in I never had an issue. Thanks for the stay and hope to see you again in the future!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, James! Stoked you enjoyed your stay with us, and hope to see you again soon. Hopefully I'll surf with ya in New Zealand someday! Shoot me the reports from Raglan!   -Sean

Summary: Our stay at Nomads was unbelievable. We booked the surf package, which included the room, three meals vouchers per day, equipment rentals, and transportation to and from the surf spots. Sean, the owner, is an awesome host who goes well out of his way to ensure guests have an excellent time.  Nomads is located just two blocks from the main downtown area of San Clemente, which has a ton of great shops and nightlife. The beach is about a 15 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thanks for the killer review, Gary! Stoked you guys enjoyed your stay and looking forward to the next trip! Keep surfing, brother!  -Sean

Summary: Best place to stay and surf in San Clemente possibly California. They have excellent surf instructors, nice rooms and maybe even the best bar. Sean, the owner, is great and helped with everything we needed and more. Highly recommend it :)
Manager Response: Hugo! Dude...had a blast surfin' and hangin' with You, Pete and Sarah! Can't wait til next time, my friend!   -Sean

Summary: I came to the area to get a tattoo and my artist suggested Nomads.  We got to the hotel and found it to be a great place.  The staff that we met there was amazing and very friendly.  I have three more sessions and we will be staying there every time we come down.  It is located in a great location with lots to do.
Manager Response: Thanks for the epic review, Danny! The crew over at Black Lantern Tattoo are awesome! Let grab a cold one at The Canteen on your next visit!   -Sean

Summary: I had a wicked week in Nomads and can highly recomend this place if your looking to surf or stay in San Clemente (booked a Surf package).  Sean really made me week perfect as he always took care of me!!! He and his team know where to go surfing in any kind of conditions and will choose the best waves for you abilities. Thank a lot Sean and i will come back for sure. Last but not least, the food and drinks upstairs on the Hotel at Tavern is delicious ;-)
Manager Response: Lukas! Such a great time surfing with you brother! AND we scored some really AMAZING surf! Hope your travels are going well and hope to share some waves with you again soon.   -Sean

Summary: What a beautiful and hip boutique hotel! The decor was stylish and great accommodations for a family of 4 and a bring along sitter. We were surprised to see how spacious and comfortable the room was. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review, Chanti! I wish you guys could of stayed longer, as well! Hope to see you again soon.   Sean

Summary Heading: Different and Better Than an Average Hotel
Summary: Nomads Hotel exceeded my expectations! The photos look great, but once you show up, you realize that the photos just don't do it justice.  This place was amazing - every detail was on point.  The owner helped me find parking.  There was complimentary beer cards for my group in the room.  The canteen was fantastic! The beds were better than my own. We stayed in the ohana room adjoining to the baja room and it was the perfect size for the bachelorette weekend that I had planned.  This is definitely somewhere I would stay again if I need a room in San Clemente.
Manager Response: Thanks for the epic review, Gypsy! Please come back again soon!   Cheers,   Sean

Summary: Nomads Hotel was really nice and owner Shawn probably the most friendliest person that I have ever met. We booked 4 days surfing package and right from the beginning (starting from emails before booking) customer service was world class. During the surf package days Shawn drove us to the beaches, gave us good tips and even surfed with us. We felt really special and it was so much fun! My boyfriend is rather big and Shawn did his absolute best to find a board big enough to him. He even helped us finding an accommodation in San Diego where we headed next. We were beginners so this suited us perfect but even if you have surfed more you might want to stay at Nomads.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review and the kind words, Anna! It was such a pleasure surfing and hanging out with you guys! I hope to see you again very soon!   Sincerely,   Sean

Summary Heading: Excellent stay in rad SC hotel!
Summary: Stayed in the Sunset Room for 3 nights while in town for a wedding. Cool room! Spacious, accommodating, comfy. Nicely decorated too. TV came with an Apple TV that had HBO GO (so I could get that Game of Thrones fix). Restaurant/bar upstairs has a huge selection of tasty beers and killer plates. Also way more affordable than any hotels nearby. Couldn't recommend enough. Will be back the next time I'm in SC for sure.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review Ryan, we are stoked to here you enjoyed your stay.   Would love to have you back in the future:)  Cheers!!  -Nomads

Summary: Stayed in the hostel room, was clean and awesome. The place rents boards and is a walk from the beach, what more can you want. Owner was super helpful and awesome, and the bar upstairs has more beers than you can drink in a weekend. We'll definitely be back for more!
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, Alaap! It was great meeting you guys and hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: The hotel is up on a hill, takes a 5-10min walk to the beach, has some nice restaurants in the area. Can't complain about anything, room was big and clean, staff was super nice, the bar has 32 beers to choose from. I stayed in the dorm room, but no one else was there. Had a great time! Three days minimum stay though...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! We are stoked you had a great time in town and would love to have you back again !  Thanks!

Summary: üå∫Sean is a wonderful host to those who like a low key vibe with an edge.  I love being a visitor in my home town & would recommend staying here & enjoying the kindness & overall great food & great service!  The wait staff are friendly & welcoming.üå∫
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! We would be stoked to have you again as a guest in the future! Hope to see ya soon  -Sean

Summary: Cool hotel, great location but not the best for a good night sleep.  Pounding is all I heard until very late in the evenings, the rooms are either below a bar (loud music) or the kitchen (dishwashers maybe). Fortunately they provide ear plugs as you need them.  Great theme, and concept but they need some installation for the noise.   Or maybe I'm old..
Manager Response: I'm very sorry if you were disturbed on Monday night, ScottwithQuestions. This comes as a surprise because the last time you stayed with us on a business trip you seemed very happy and returned for a second visit. Our hotel is a fun and lively place best suited for travelers on vacation and maybe not the best for business travelers. As you can see from our previous reviews most of our guests and are stoked to have The Canteen upstairs and thoroughly enjoy the complementary welcome "adult" beverages with their stay.   I'm also very sorry I wasn't able to sell and invoice one of our rental surfboards as accommodations. You seemed a little upset about that. If a guest rents or buys a surfboard I need to put it in our system as that, not room sales.   I can't help but ask myself...Could this be a case of TripAdvisor bullying?? I sure hope not, ScottwithQuestions! Regardless, I'm very sorry that your second stay with us was not as enjoyable as your first.   Sincerely,  Sean

Summary Heading: Great boys surf weekend at Nomads!
Summary: Came down from Vancouver BC for the long weekend.  Sean was there to great us and get us rolling!  Room has tons of space, great shower with room to wash off the wetsuits and hooks to hang them on.   Bar upstairs was GREAT!!  Awesome poke bowls and it shuts down at midnight, not that we could have cared as crashed from the surfing.  Gave us a late check out to accommodate late flight and let us get in a morning surf session.   Will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for the epic review, Roy! It was great having you guys and hope to see you back here sooner rather than later!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Most comfortable stay in the best location.
Summary: We stayed at this hotel on a Tuesday evening and fell in love with it immediately. Our room was the first room to the right with the patio- so lovely having the patio facing the street! The room was spacious for a one bed, so clean, beautifully furnished and oh my gosh the shower is amazing haha- huge bathroom. The bed was also extremely comfortable. The location is so ideal. Literally you walk outside and can walk anywhere nearby in the heart of downtown SC. We also walked up to the restaurant (couldn't hear the restaurant at all from our hotel room) for the most delicious and fresh dinner and drinks. Definitely will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind review! Please come back and see us again soon!   -Sean

Summary: Came here solo on the 4 day surf package. Was in the boat room for two nights and the bunk room for two. The place is modern, clean, very centrally located, and the attached restaurant is an awesome place to eat or have drinks. The wetsuit and board I rented were top notch- there's a wide selection of boards to rent. You can also rent bikes or skateboards. But best of all was the surf. Sean and Ridge were awesome guides. Had four solid days of surf. Will definitely be staying here again next time I'm in town!
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words, Ron! I had a blast surfing San O with ya! Looking forward to seeing you again soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Beautiful and friendly. Must go for any surfer.
Summary: The most beautiful little hotel. Everywhere you look you can tell there is been attention to detail and love put into how the place is decorated. Not sure what star it rates but feels very homely and enjoyed my stay more than more 4 star experiences.   Lots of positive energy. The owner is super interesting and has a lot of surf knowledge about the world and in the local area. Any travelling surfer would be crazy not to stop by.   The bar attached out back is one of the best places to eat in San Clement and has world class poke!
Manager Response: It was great having you here at Nomads, Alan! Hope to see you again very soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay while surfing Southern-California
Summary: Nomads Hotel is a perfect place to stay in Southern-California, especially if you are aiming to surf the various surf spots in the area. It is nicely located in the center of San Clemente. Both the owners are very friendly and I have spent many surfs together with them in water during my two-weeks stay. Even if they are not able to surf them selves they were happy to drop me of at one of my favorite surf spots. They even picked up a surfboard together with me in the area! The rooms are nicely decorated and have a great vibe to it. The hotel and rooms are both very clean (cleaned every day), towels and shampoo are refreshed daily. The food at the restaurant above is amazing, and it is a good place to hang out after surf. Taken together, the people running the hotel make it unique
Manager Response: Jens!! It was a pleasure having you as our guest for two weeks! I love having long term guests because it gives me a chance to really get to know someone. You arrived as our guest and left as our family! Hope to see you again very soon!   -Sean

Summary: Nomads was very welcoming and was a great place to meet other travelers. Sean was a great host and provided transportation to and from surf spots. The beds were very comfortable and big. The bar upstairs has some of the best tacos! I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you, Deidra! Stoked that I could be a part of your surf trip! Come back soon!   -Sean

Summary: Awesome place! Stayed with three other lads in the dorm-bunk room and did a four day surf package. The food was brilliant, surf soulfood type stuff, and we were happy to have every meal there as the menu was massive. All very clean and comfy, I'm planning on returning with girlfriend and staying in the private rooms. All decorated with a lot of care and style to give it a very modern Californian feel. All staff were super friendly, and Sean our beach guide was really helpful and took us to all the best beachs, sorted us with equipment and gave us plenty of surf tips. Cheers Nomads!
Manager Response: Thanks for the epic review, Pete! Looking forward to seeing you and your girlfriend when you get back to The States!   -Sean

Summary: Had a fantastic time at the Nomads hotel. Stayed in the bunk room which was cosy but good value for money. The surf package was great with the best guide. To top it off the food in the restaurant is some of the best in San Clemente. Would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words! Hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: I booked a surf package with 3 friends and found this place to be awesome. Whilst the bunkroom was "cosy" it was more than adequate with the worlds comfiest beds. As part of the deal we received 3 meals a day. 2 of these were  at Nomads Canteen upstairs which had a refreshingly healthy and tasty menu. Service was phenomenal and you had the feeing that this was a well run establishment with awesome staff. Sean was an amazing surf guide who couldn't have been more helpful. I very rarely find somewhere that I would happily return to but this is one of them.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Ben! I had a blast surfing with you guys!   -Sean

Summary: Great place with great people! Sean took us out Surfing and showed us all the surfspots in San Clemente. He also organized a surfteacher for my travel Buddy. The whole staff gives you a great familiar feeling. The Hotel Looks very cool and everything is very clean. The Restaurant (Nomads Cantine) is next to the Hotel and offers great fresh food plus they got 20sth beer on tap...also great from the german Point of view :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Hope to see you again very soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: My new favorite spot in Southern California
Summary: I recently discovered the Nomads Hotel and as someone who travels often and spends a lot of time in hotels, this was a refreshing experience.  First of all, there is no check in or room key exchange...in fact I would struggle to use the word HOTEL for this place.  I found the experience to be more like staying at your coolest friend's house who just happens to have a massive, dope home in a surf town.  Oh, you need a board??? Cool. because they have and rent them for super cheap.  You want a chill spot to have some cold beers?  Perfect, because they have that too...right upstairs.  I cannot say enough about this place and how comfortable the room was and how warm the crew was.  What I can say is that I will definitely stay there every time I am in San Clemente and I fully plan
Manager Response: Thanks for the epic review, Dan! Can't wait to share some waves at San O again!   -Sean

Summary Heading: We are ready to come back!!!
Summary: I came with my best friend for a three night stay earlier this month and we are already ready to come back! From the moment we got there we loved the atmosphere. Even the hallways smelled amazing and welcoming. Nomads clearly cares about its guests and has thought of everything to make our stay more comfortable. From the complementary  Kureg coffee to the rental surfboards to the rental beach package (that includes towels and a cooler) we were so pleased! We also loved the Apple TV and our complementary drink tickets for Nomads Canteen! Speaking of Nomads Canteen..we are not ashamed to admit we ate there every day of our stay...sometimes twice a day. The convenience of having clean and delicious food located just above the hotel was too good to pass. Word to the wise: try the
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the kind words, Courtney! Come back and see us again soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Great hostel and hotel style rooms
Summary: Great rooms with big bathrooms, the hostel style room had huge beds and fresh towels every day. Sean incredibly accommodating and helpful. In good location close to the main street and a 15min walk to the beach. Would recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Liam! Hope to see you in Torquay someday!   -Sean

Summary: I could not believe my eyes when I saw that this place was not fully booked for the whole summer. The amazing decor (look for the beautiful wood-carved sinks), comfortable beds and extra's like daily room cleaning makes this place extremely good value. As a super nice gesture your first drink in the canteen above the hotel is free, EVERY NIGHT!! The canteen above the hotel serves great food/beer and is a nice place to meet people.   Sean is an amazing host and a great person in general. Even though I was the only surfer staying there at that moment, he still took some of his valuable time to take me surfing in SanO in his rad vintage car twice, which was amazing. Thanks for the awesome stay at Nomads, Sean!!
Manager Response: Thank you, Pieter! Had a blast taking the '71 Travel All down to San Onofre and sharing some waves with you, my friend! I hope you're enjoying the rest of your travels! Make sure to keep the stoke alive while home in The Netherlands!    -Sean

Summary: I find this place searching on internet days before leave Ocean Beach. This hostel are amazing, and very quietly. But if you wanna a place with more people, you just can go up stairs and get some beers in the the Nomad's Canteen, that have many labels of brewries from SoCal. Sean is a great host, always asking about your stay and give some trip tips.
Manager Response: Thanks for the epic review, Igor! Please come back for a visit soon!   -Sean

Summary: Nomad's provided the ultimate surf vacation stay. Centrally located with all the local knowledge and expertise to set you up for the best break on any given day. Sean went out of his way to make sure everyone on our surf team knew the lay of the land and was happy with every aspect of our stay. Sean even has a bunch of rentals for those who decided to not bring (or forgot) boards, wetsuits, skateboards, etc.  The accommodations were top notch, from the totally cool surf rooms to the attached canteen with great food, family friendly atmosphere, and a fun nighttime bar crowd.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, Clyde! I speak for the Nomads Family when I say it was great to get to know you and the crew! Looking forward to the next trip!   -Sean

Summary: My apologies for taking so long providing my review.  My experience at Nomads Hotel & Canteen was perfect in every way.  They provided everything they promised and more.  Beautiful grounds very well and maintained, the canteen have excellent food and beverages and a variety of delicious and tasty dishes, well balanced  and nutritious, fantastic colorful bar restaurant the will rival any Aussie or British pub. Incredible d√©cor, delightful ambiance, magnificent poster photography true of the hotel even small library the will keep you entertain for a few days. I was met by the hotel manager at the door, who is hands on and always available also, super friendly, nice and they had spacey accommodations. In addition, the bed was so soft and comfortable I slept like a baby.  I met and
Manager Response: Jorge!! Dude...had a blast surfing with you every day! Ahhh the benifits of THE SURF PACKAGE : ) Let's get start palnning that surf trip to Peru my friend! See you sooner rather than later!   -Sean

Summary: Recently had the pleasure of staying at Nomads while in San Clemente with a high school surf team.  Nomads has a total of 7 rooms which we took 4 that are HUGE and VERY COMFORTABLE with a unique modern design.  We stayed 9 nights at Nomads and were treated like Royalty!  Sean, hotel owner, made sure every need of ours was met and was BEYOND FRIENDLY!  Jeff, restaurant owner, fed us three times a day and the FOOD WAS FABULOUS!  Mica, hotel staff, came to our rooms everyday and stocked all necessary items and made sure all was PERFECT!  NOMADS is the PERFECT PLACE while visiting CALI and VERY AFFORDABLE.  Thanks NOMADS!!!!!  Satellite High Surf Team!!!!!  See you guys NEXT YEAR!!! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Julie! We LOVED having your group here and are looking forward to having you again next year!   -Sean

Summary: Everyone is looking for something different. That‚Äôs the reason Baskin Robbins has 31 flavors; yes? Given that, it‚Äôs logical that not every place is right for every person. If you don‚Äôt believe me‚Ä¶just browse the various reviews on this site. I‚Äôve been around the world a couple of times. I‚Äôve stayed in everything from a mud hut to the Ritz Carlton. For me, it‚Äôs all about the right experience and Nomads was right in every way. It was exactly as advertised. Sean runs the hotel (yes, below a bar‚Ä¶just as the website describes) and he bends over backwards to accommodate. The folks upstairs, in the canteen, are equally awesome. Sure, this is a surfer bar, in a surf town, run by surfers...  Some context for you: I‚Äôm a middle-aged, balding, out of shape white dude. I used to surf 20+
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, Jim! Hope to see you again very soon!   -Sean

Summary: Had really high hopes for this place but was left disappointed. Our room was the nosiest hotel room Ive ever been in - below the bar - at times, it felt like the roof was going to collapse on top of us. Even in the morning before the bar opened, the staff were talking very loudly and playing music. We left the place very tired and I went straight to bed at our next lodgings. In addition, we could hear everything our neighbours said and did and even walk straight into their room (connecting door was open, perhaps a mistake?). Cleaner came at 9.30am and we asked to return later but they never did so I tidied up. When we went to bar, they didnt seem to care that we were guests. There was no "how is your stay?" "Any issues?". There is no check-in and we weren't greeted at all, not
Manager Response: I'm so sorry that you had a bad experience, Lindseyb6! We want all of our traveling nomads to enjoy their stay.   It would have been great to meet you and I'm so sorry we didn't cross paths! We are a B&B style hotel with no front desk, so if you only stay with us for one night, I may or may not run into you. Perhaps you didn't notice my personal cell phone number provided on the confirmation letter that every hotel guest receives. I provide this so that I can stay up to date on arrival & departure times and any other amenities needed or issues our guests might have (surfers or otherwise).   As you can see from our previous reviews, most of our guests really enjoy having the fun environment of The Canteen right upstairs (especially the coupon for 1 free complimentary beer of their choice). We are a very fun, light hearted, and sometimes lively hotel; and yes we are surfers, so we are relaxed and laid back.  Maybe we weren't a good fit for you, and for that, I apologize!  Sincerely,  -Sean

Summary: Shaun was great. Very accommodating. He took us surfing at Tresels every morning. The food at the bar is great. Poke bowl carne a dada and chips and guacamole are the best.  Great location as I was able to walk to the beach. Walk to kareoke walk to all the good resturaunts. Steve at the bar is great too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the epic review, Mike! Hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: REALLY enjoyed our stay!  The owner came out to greet us with a super friendly smile.  He gave us a couple of free drink tickets to head upstairs while we waited for our room to be cleaned (we were early).    Really beautiful restaurant with outdoor seating and friendly wait staff.  The room itself is BEAUTIFULLY done.   The shower is huge and comfortable, the artwork on the walls is super cool, Apple TV and really comfortable large bed.  We would totally go back for a fun, chill, romantic weekend.  We love San Clemente.  We live in San Diego but it is a really cool completely different beach/surfer vibe.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the awesome review! I hope to see you guys again very soon!   -Sean

Summary: I loved everything about the hotel, the rooms are nicely done. You don't feel cramped at all. The rooms are nicely priced too. The beds are comfortable and the Apple TV is a plus. No worries about parking, parking was free.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! Please come back and see us again soon!   -Sean

Summary: This place was awesome! The Bali room was very spacious and gorgeous! Sean was awesome! Very welcoming and attentive. Had a great stay. Enjoyed the poke at the canteen and all the hospitality that they had to offer. We will be back! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words, Brock! Hope to see you guys again soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Feels like staying with Best Friends!!
Summary: I stayed here 7 long weekends in a row and Sean the owner and the incredible rooms are why I kept coming back.  This is not just a hotel but more a welcoming and comfortable experience with new Friends
Manager Response: Thanks for the killer review, Rob! Get back out here soon for those surf lessons!   -Sean

Summary: Hidden gem of a hotel in the ideal location in San Clemente!  The owner was wonderful he even gives you his personal cell number.  Where have you seen that lately?  Very helpful team.  Great pricing and awesome rooms.    We stayed in the boat room (pretty small but very cheap) and Bali room (huge room that sleeps up to 6).  Even has Netflix on the TVs.  Bike, paddle board, surfboard rentals all at a very fair price!  Fridge, coffee, microwave etc in the Bali room.  Book this room if you have 5-6 people and it will work great!  We are happy we ventured out and tried a place like this rather than a chain.  A++++
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! come back soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Great hotel and awesome surf package!
Summary: Nomads - hotel, restaurant, and so much more!  My solo visit to Nomads was on the "surf package", an all inclusive deal that covers the room, food, equipment, and guided surf sessions.  The rooms at Nomad's are great; nice, clean, and have a very crisp/new feel about them.  The photos on Nomad's website give an honest impression of the rooms. And yes, they really are as spacious as they look.  The hotel is located in an excellent part of town, with easy walking distance to tons of shops, restaurants, etc.   Meals at the restaurant were included on the surf package.  But even if you're not on the meal plan, you should still check it out.  Some might think that the "canteen" upstairs would just serve surfer gruel.  Not so.  The food is amazing. The best fish tacos I've ever had.
Manager Response: Thanks for the AMAZING review, Henry! It was great surfing and hanging out with you! Looking forward to your next visit!  -Sean

Summary: OUTSTANDING!! Clean, quiet, courteous and affordable. The Canteen is awesome and very user friendly. I would recommend Nomads to everyone. We can't say enough good things about it. We will definitely visit it again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! I hope to see you guys again soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: A Soon To Be Discovered Vacation Spot
Summary: I found this hotel via the Hotel Tonight app as a last-minute resort when looking for a place to stay outside of Los Angeles. After booking I spoke with Sean Rowland who was very friendly and guided me through the process of checking in - there is no official concierge or front desk - you pick up your envelop at the Canteen upstairs with a complimentary beer of your choice (33 to choose from). We stayed in the "BAJA" room. Each room has its own unique style and layout with super comfortable beds. The location is also convenient, located one block away from the main street of town and within walking distance (2-3 blocks) of at least 8-10 restaurants. The Canteen gets lively after 8 or 9pm and although upstairs above the rooms, never gets too loud, closing down around midnight. If
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words, John! Hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: We were so lucky to "find" Nomads Hotel on Tripadvisor!  My teen DD and I spent three days there on a trip to meet Bethany Hamilton!  It was the perfect surf, beach place.  We absolutely LOVED our room - the Bali Room - which is beautiful and huge!  So comfy with room to spread out and a delightful bathroom.  Beautiful artwork and objets d'arts from around the world.  We loved being able to walk to the Pier as well as upstairs to the Canteen (reviewed separately) - and a great restaurant called Vine.  Sean is a personable, helpful, cool host!  What a cool place!
Manager Response: I was so stoked and honored to be a part of your special vacation, Lisa! What an awesome experience. Come back and see us again soon!   -Sean

Summary: Stayed for one night in the Cali room. Super clean and comfortable spot. Great  restaurant upstairs. Walking distance to downtown. Bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was huge and super clean. Apple TV in the room and free wifi which wa a great. Lots of character and the owner is great.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Hope to see you again really soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Spent an amazing week on the surf package
Summary: Five stars. Nomads Hotel was one of the coolest most unique places my wife and I have stayed in our travels. We just finished a week on the surf package staying in the California room and one of our friends stayed in the boat room. First off, Sean who owns and runs the hotel was amazing from the time we booked until the moment we left.  He is one of the most genuine guys we have run into in our travels and made sure we had a blast. He took my wife and her friend to the gym he works out at and they had a blast, he took us surfing every day and not once made us feel insecure about our abilities. Sean is a great surfer, we were not, but he made sure to help us get better and most importantly made sure we had fun. The surfer package we were on included a light breakfast  and then
Manager Response: I had a blast surfing and hanging out with you guys, Watson! I can't wait to do it again!  -Sean

Summary: Nomads was recommended by a friend that lives in town. It turned out to be a very nice, clean place to stay for a few nights. Was adequate space and place for a hub to go exploring and surfing.  Sean the manager was very friendly and helpful and ran a good operation.  The bar/restaurant upstairs was killer! heaps of craft beers and try the sashimi punch bowl. Thanks guys.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review! Come back soon!   -Sean

Summary: Awesome spot to stay, we had 10 nights in the USA from Australia, we booked 2 nights as we wanted to travel around. We found the staff, service, price, gorgeous location and Nomads canteen so great we stayed for the whole 10 nights! We travelled to Disney land, San Diego, Venice Beach, Laguna and Huntington Beach all from Nomads. Would totally recommend, can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review, Melinda! Hope to see you guys again really soon!  -Sean

Summary Heading: Nomads an example of surf community at it's best...
Summary: They made special accomodation for us at the last minute, and we felt totally taken care of. Personable, down to earth, and generous owner Sean made our experience taking kids to surf SoCal (from Santa Cruz) extra special. He and the hotel generally are an example of the surf community at it's best. Clean & well amenitied room was perfect for our tribe of 5. The variety of rooms they have for families, couples, weeklong or overnight is impressive. They got it all! And good food, too. Sure didn't mind that beer upon arrival after many hours of driving... a nice touch indeed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words and the awesome review, Rebecca! We hope to see your family again really soon!  -Sean

Summary Heading: Nomads is the spot in San Clemente
Summary: My wife and son just stayed for a night at in the Bali Room at Nomads, between surf days at San Onofre. It's the perfect spot. A brand new room with a great vibe and all you need to catch some Z's between sessions. The Canteen upstairs is unreal, with plenty of beers on tap and and outdoor patio to enjoy the sunset. Try one of the Poke bowls for a little taste of paradise. The shops on El Camino Real are only a short walk away, and the Pier is just down the road. This is the spot if you're looking for something casual and comfortable in San Clemente. We'll be back for the next swell. P.S.: Epic surf shots throughout the hotel take the island vibes theme to another level. Very cool.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for the great review Brian! You and your family were awesome!   -Sean

Summary Heading: The BEST kept secret in San Clem!!
Summary: Stayed at Nomads during the Hurley Pro week and cannot say enough outstanding, wonderful things about Sean, Chris and all the folks there who took such great care of me. Been going to San Clem for years - but stayed here for the first time b/c it's new and this place is the BEST!! The rooms are brand new and very hip, the food is the best in town (tip: Indo Shrimp Bowl rocks) and the vibe is the friendliest that San Clem has to offer... and watching the Pacific sunset from the deck a few blocks away with a cold beer in your hand after a day of surfing is awesome!! My only regret is that this gem of San Clem will get out there and soon be the hardest place in town to stay... But I had to write them a great review b/c they really treated me well. Like a secret surf spot that you
Manager Response: It was great meeting you Griff! We hope to see you again really soon!   -Sean

Summary: Stayed on one of the surf packages.  Eat + Sleep + Surf = perfect vacation.  The food at the restaurant upstairs is epic.  The staff is great, Sean will take you surfing, Jeff will feed you and Mika will make sure your room is always looking great. Great location near bars and few minutes walk from the pier
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you and great surfing with you, Nick! We hope to see you again next year for the Hurley Pro at Trestles!   -Sean

Summary Heading: The design, convenience, accommodations, and customer service are unreal!
Summary: My girlfriend and I are from San Diego and stayed for one night in the Boathouse room during the Hurley Pro surf competition. We were so happy we decided to stay a second night at the last minute. We were on a budget but didn't feel like it. The Boathouse is great for 2 people, and the feel of the room was super cozy & comfortable. The staff was very accommodating in putting us up in what they had available the next night which was the Ohana room. More spacious and suitable for up to 3 for sure. The design of this place is unreal, each room has a different feel of locations from around the world and they incorporated beautiful finishes and photography that relate to each place...plus it's so convenient to everything. We were able to walk to all the restaurants, the beach and
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review LizzyMMiller! We hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: Arrived just in time for the SoCal heat wave, not knowing that there was no AC in the rooms. There are maybe 8 parking spaces. People visiting the Cantina use them also. So first night I get a ridiculous $43 parking ticket. Sign says " All day parking" small print says except for 2am to 5am. Really??? Owner manager Jeff was somewhat sympathetic and bought us a few beers for the trouble.  One more gripe. The rooms are really loud from the upstairs Cantina. don't expect to get any rest until after midnight or so. ( ear plugs are provided......) The rooms are very well appointed. Cool surf pics abound. Great beds.  The walk to the beach is not too bad. ( all down hill) The walk back is more difficult.  Its a good location with plenty of shopping and restaurants around. ( I'll

Summary: Nothing special here. Small room, big price. Outside temp was 85, room temp was 90. Cantina upstairs was nice, but did nothing to outway the cons. Parking is horrible at the hotel! Recieved a $45 ticket our first night for parking in the hotel parking lot, owner was unsimpathetic. Nice town with many more lodging options.

Summary: This not only my favorite place to grab a great bite eat in San Clemente, but also my favorite place to stay as well!  When I first got the tour of the rooms by owners Jeff, and Sean; I was floored by the decor variation of each room.  The smoke smelled of room of the Roadway Inn down the street is more expensive than their most prized room; the Bali Room.  I HIGHLY recommend the Cali Room, paired with their Poke appetizer, and a fresh brew!  Cheers Sean and Jeff for making such a radical establishment!  Best, Bryan "BJ" Johnson
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review! Hope to see you again soon!  -Sean

Summary: My husband and I were looking for a place to stay in San Clemente for one night. Our friends who live in the area told us about Nomads and we are thrilled that they did! We loved the hotel and the town so much that we extended our stay for a second night and had it not been for work, we would have stayed longer. The owners are very accommodating and the unique d√©cor and layout of the hotel has to be seen to be fully appreciated. The food in the attached restaurant was fresh and tasty and the staff was friendly and personable.We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thanks, Becky! We loved having you guys and hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: The best San Clemente has to offer
Summary: As you can tell from my profile i review a lot of places inn San Clemente, and this place is by far one of the best if not the best.  Rates are great, roooms are outstanding.   They even have a Hostel style bunkhouse for a terrific price.  They offer great sufing adventure packages that are all inclusive.  This wouuld be my 1st choice for a room in town everytime.  They dont have many rooms but they are choice.  Close to the beach, and walking distance of all the shops and eateries in town.  They also have a great cnateen and bar upstairs
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words Marty! hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: Love the new Nomads Hotel!  The rooms are huge and will accommodate a group or family.  All the rooms are decorated with amazing finds from around the world and top surf photographer, Sean Rowland's, photo prints.  Reasonable rates and Nomads Cafe right upstairs for some of the best food and beer selection in San Clemente.  Just steps from downtown San Clemente and all the great restaurants and shops.  The San Clemente Pier, Beach Trail and beaches are 1/4 mile walk down the street.
Manager Response: Thanks, Greg! We loved having your team here and hope have you guys back really soon!  -Sean

Summary Heading: Super chill accommodation with awesome bar
Summary: Stayed at Nomads on my own and it was a great place to meet people, as there is restaurant and bar upstairs which is always really packed and serves awesome food and beer. The owners are friendly and helpful, and will go out of their way to make sure you find the best surf in the area, and have a great time.
Manager Response: Thank for the awesome review and hope top see you again soon Caity!

Summary: Great rooms and food. The staff is so friendly and helpful. They are willing to go above and beyond to ensure you feel at home at Nomads! The Bali room is very roomy and can easily sleep up to five. The proximity is also great. Nomads is in the center of downtown San Clemente and just minutes from the beach.
Manager Response: Thanks for the kind words John! Hope to see you again soon!   -Sean

Summary: Cool surf themed rooms with great access to Nomads Canteen (right up the steps w/o going outside!) Jeff, Rene and Sean are THE best hosts! Rolled up on them outside chillin on the deck with friends and was instantly welcomed felt like home for a former San Clemente resident visiting. I would highly recommend staying at this new hotel if you're looking for the most unique hotel in S CA.
Manager Response: Thanks John! Good hanging out out with you guys on the deck that day. Such a great day!  Hope to see you again!   -Sean

Summary: The hotel is situated in a great spot where we walked everywhere all weekend. We parked the car right in front (no charge). Quick walk to all the restaurants, pier & beach.  The owner is a great host. Our "Bali" room on the first night was really nice. It did remind us of our visits to Bali a bit. Room is big, bed was comfortable.   The only down sides were the street noise & the lack of AC on a pretty hot weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! Hope to see you again really soon!   -Sean

Summary Heading: BEST HOTEL IN SAN CLEMENTE...MAYBE ALL OF SOUTHERN CALI
Summary: I'm from Florida and traveled to San Clemente as a Competitor in the 2015 USA National Surfing Championships in June. As a 42 year old, i've traveled the world surfing and working as a boat captain. I've lived in Costa Rica and Hawaii, and have to say that the hospitality here at Nomads equals or surpasses the places I've stayed at other world venues. Traveling solo I flew into San Diego and took the Amtrak Surfliner train up to San Clemente and Jeff,one of the owners, was there to pick me up and bring me back to the hotel. the same service was provided for the exit trip a week later ,this time by Sean. Sean, during my stay, made sure to have me at my contest heats ON TIME, provided local knowledge of the area, places to go have a meal, a beer,ect.... at venues other than
Manager Response: Scott! It was great having you at the hotel and awesome getting to know you! Come out for the next swell we will take the boat out! Yeeww!   -Sean

Summary Heading: SURF HAVEN NOT JUST FOR SURFERS!
Summary: I was searching for a place to stay for my daughter's lacrosse  tournament in Oceanside...because as far as I could tell from my research, San Clemente seemed the place we would like more.. It was exactly what we wanted, and it resembled our way of traveling...Quality at no fuss to us! Sean (owner) was great with answering questions and was prompt returning my texts to his cell. Nomads is a place where there is no lobby. There is only access to your rooms through keyless entry. Loved that. The rooms reminded us of Bali and my boyfriend had surfed at all the places that were in the pictures on the wall throughout the corridors and upstairs.. The decor was awesome and apropos for the hotel's concept. My daughter was very comfortable here. We loved the bar/restaurant on top. Great
Manager Response: Thanks Katherine! We loved having you you guys! Come see us again soon!   -Sean

Summary: My husband and I stayed in the California Room for a night away from kids. We were provided a code to get in as there is no "front desk". The room was very clean and had everything we needed including a small fridge and Kourig coffee maker. There was a small patio right outside the slider that leads out to the side street, where we enjoyed a cup of coffee before dinner. We were able to get ice from the canteen upstairs with no problem. The king bed was super comfortable!! The weather was warm but not too hot. There's a standing fan in the room, but it's a little loud and there's no AC so it might get a little warm in the hotter weather. You can open the slider but you're on the ground level. All in all this was a great room and really enjoyed our night away!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review Lori! We are currently working on getting AC units in each room. We appreciate your feedback!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Should have made this our FIRST choice
Summary: We traveled recently to California for the USA Surf Championships. I saw Nomads but was unsure; it was new and not directly on the ocean. We ended up renting a condo closer to the contest which left us with an open night before we flew out. We decided to take a chance on Nomads.Sean, was AWESOME! He welcomed this tired Grommom with a beer in their surf themed Cantina. My teenage boys and I instantly fell in love with the vibe of this place. The decor was perfect and the room super comfortable. The location was actually perfect. We were close enough to just about everything. I seriously regretted NOT staying here for our entire stay. We will absolutely be pack to check out their all inclusive surf package.
Manager Response: It was GREAT having you and your family here Colleen! Hope to see you guys again really soon!   -Sean

Summary: We only stayed for one night, but it felt more like staying in someone's home, than in a hotel. You'd never know there was a cantina above with great food and drinks. All the rooms are different, we had The Baja room. The owner Sean is super down to earth and forwards all calls to his cell in case you need anything. You can walk to the beach and we got coupons for free sunset beers. Fun place!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review Bonnie!   -Sean

Summary Heading: Great spot, good food, great value for an awesome room.
Summary: We are a couple who stayed in the king bed room at Nomads. Really good vibe. Minimum hassle. Mexican food in the restaurant at the back is really delicious to. We didn't check out the shared rooms but this was really good - cool design, super comfortable bed, clean and in the middle of everything. We stayed just before 4th July weekend, 2015.
Manager Response: Thank you! We hope to see you guys again soon!   -Sean

Summary: I really enjoyed staying at Nomads. The room was comfortable and I loved the setup of the place. Everything was well designed, and I felt right out home. The poke bowls in the tavern upstairs are amazing!
Manager Response: Thanks Greg! Glad you scored some surf and warmer water here in SoCal! See you soon!   -Sean

Summary: Reserved the California room for the mum, it was amazing. She enjoyed it. The service was amazing, people were great, great location! You can walk to the shops in downtown Del Mar. They serve amazing food upstairs as well. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your excellent review! We hope to see you again really soon!   -Sean

Summary: Conveniently located about a mile from the beach.  Welcoming modern rooms that really pop with unique furniture and killer artwork.  Hungry? head right upstairs for a bite to eat and grab a drink at the canteen. Super friendly owners who make you feel right at home.  Cant go wrong here!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Hope to see you again this summer!   -Sean

Summary: I've stayed in lots of places in San Clemente and Nomads Hotel is my new favorite. The room I stayed in (Bali room) was huge. Staff was awesome and we even scored epic surf down the street. I might rethink some of my more expensive surf trips this year and book this spot when I see a good swell on the charts. Oh, and the food and drinks upstairs are better than most everything else I've sampled in the city.
Manager Response: Thanks for the double shaka!! See you here for the next swell! Yeeww!   -Sean

Summary: Located below the best bar (Nomads!) in San Clemente lies this gem! Contemporary beach themed rooms dressed with awesome photography done by one of the owners. From small rooms to grand suites, there's a room for every budget. Perfect location. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you jdkatz7 for the kind review! We hope to see you again soon!   - Sean

Summary: I've been a frequent visitor to Nomad's Canteen and was excited to hear they were working on adding some hotel rooms downstairs. When I saw on Facebook that were finally open and having a soft opening, I immediately made reservations. The rooms are beautiful and comfortable.  (The shower was absolutely gorgeous.)  They have everything you need: coffee maker, refrigerator, tv, wifi...the comforts of home.  It's within walking distance to Del Mar where there are a lot of shops and restaurants and if you're up to it a nice walk to the beach. The fact that you have the bar right upstairs with great food is a huge plus.  My favorite is the half & half Poke bowl...which i refer to as the "Exotic" bowl.  The people there are beyond friendly and make you feel like family. My only regret
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words Helen! We hope to see you again really soon!

Summary: The rooms are spacious and nicely decorated with a different theme in each room, very fun. Very clean and close to great places to eat (don't forget to grab some food and drinks upstairs in the bar) The owners are awesome! The beach is a short walk, truly a fantastic place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! See you soon!

Summary: Thank you so much for creating a bright and relaxing hotel. Our room was extremely clean and comfortable. We very much enjoyed that everything was within walking distance. We had fun ordering from Nomads canteen upstairs and bringing it to our patio so that we could continue our game of Monopoly! Recommendations for breakfast were very good! Everyone we met was friendly and kind! BONUS,there was a keurig in our room! Nicole and Andy
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your special weekend here! Thank you and we hope to see you again really soon!

Summary Heading: Best lodging option in San Clemente!!!
Summary: We had an excellent stay in the "Bali Room".  The staff and owners made us feel like family and the rooms provided far more bang for our budget than a typical hotel could ever hope to offer.  Their canteen restaurant on site served up some amazing dishes and local craft beer...I highly recommend their Poke Bowl...wow!  Their location was in the heart of San Clemente, allowing us to walk to other restaurants, stores, and the beach.  They even drove us down to Trestles so we could experience our first paddle out at Lowers!!  We will be back for sure!
Manager Response: We are stoked that you enjoyed your first surf trip to San Clemente! The Trestles season is here so hope to see you again this summer!

Summary: We stayed at this brand new hotel in San Clemente for a week and had an incredible time. The hotel has super comfy beds, friendly owners, tons of space, and a great vibe. The upstairs restaurant is convenient, has great food (fish tacos and poke are my favorites) and good craft beer. It's located just a block from downtown San Clemente, the pier, and awesome beaches/surfing! We will definitely be back, and we highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you Christy! It was nice meeting you and we had a great time while you were here! Hope to see you again really soon!
